scenario_text.value: Yo, Takuma. Ready to head to the shrine?
How should I respond to Kaito?
It’ll take more time.
I’m almost done.

It’ll take some more time. I think it’s the
same for the others.
What about you, Kaito?

I don’t really have anything to prep...
I’ll be ready to go whenever Miu is.

Just gimme a holler when it’s time for us to
head out, yeah?
I’m almost done.
All right, gimme a shout when we’re going.

I don’t really have anything to prep...
I’ll be ready to go whenever Miu is.

You’re always thinking about Miu. Even now,
aren’t you, Kaito?
I gotta say, it’s pretty impressive.

Really? I’m just doing what a brother does.
We’ve been through a lot together

What about you, Takuma? Is there anything out
there you’d do anything to protect?
Something I want to protect...?
I don’t really know.
I...don’t think so.
I don’t really know...

I mean, I’ve thought about protecting my
friends, or Agumon...

That’s different. When it comes to Miu,
I lose sight of everything else.
I...don’t think so.

I mean, I’ve thought about protecting my
friends, or Agumon...

Still, I get the feeling that’s not what you
mean, Kaito.

Yeah... For me, Miu is the only important
thing to me. I lose sight of everything else.

But I guess that’s why everyone trusts you
like they do, Takuma.
I can see that.

Yeah, I bet that’s why.
Me, I can’t do things that way.
You were super pissed when Miu got kidnapped.

Yeah... All I could think about was saving
her when that happened.

In all honesty, I didn’t give two flips about
anything else.

Miu says that’s what she hates about you,
you know?

Don’t say that, Dracumon. Even I don’t know
what to do about it.

I don’t want Miu to hate me, but I just can’t
help myself...
Hey, Takuma. What do you think I should do?
How should I answer Kaito’s concerns?
Try talking to Miu.
I don’t know.
I think you should talk to Miu, Kaito.

She may not like how protective you are, but
that doesn’t mean she hates you.

I think so, too.
You should do as Takuma says.

Talk it out, huh... Not a bad idea. Face to
face, we should be able to hash it out.
I guess you’ll have to think of something.
Yeah, guess so... Thanks, Takuma.

I don’t know, Kaito. You should think of
something on your own.
Yeah... Sorry for asking something weird...
I’ll try thinking on my own for a bit longer.
I’ll help out too, Kaito!
Cool. Thanks, Dracumon.
